_source.text: A fifteen minute walk from The Grand Palace and Khao San Road, Wat Saket is better known to tourists as Golden Mount.

text: A fifteen minute walk from **The** **Grand** **Palace** and Khao San Road, Wat Saket **is** **better** known to tourists as Golden Mount.

_source.text: A Better Tourist Trap (30) - Build an Aerodrome and a Seven-star hotel in a single mission Better Than Tenements (30) - Have a Ziggurat with 50 families as tenants Capo Di Tutti Capi (20) - Renovate your Palace Going Green (20) - Build 4 Bio Farms and 4 Organic Ranches in a single mission Heaven On Earth (20) - Build a Diamond Cathedral before 1990 Office Space (30) - Have a Babel Tower with 50 employees
